name: priviblur
description: PriviBlur is a self-hosted tool for face blurring in videos and images. It supports configurable filters and batch processing through a browser interface, designed to enhance privacy for shared media.
features: Face detection: Automatically detect faces in images and videos using machine learning algorithms.
Automatic blurring: Apply blur effects to detected faces to protect privacy in shared media.
Batch processing: Process multiple images or videos simultaneously for efficient privacy protection.
Configurable filters: Adjust blur intensity, detection sensitivity, and processing parameters.
Video support: Blur faces in video files frame-by-frame with optimized processing.
Browser interface: Upload and process media through an intuitive web-based interface.
Preview mode: Review detected faces and blur effects before finalizing changes.
Manual adjustments: Manually select or deselect faces for blurring when automatic detection needs refinement.
Format support: Process common image formats (JPEG, PNG) and video formats (MP4, AVI).
Privacy focused: All processing happens locally on your server without sending data to external services.
Export options: Download processed media with faces blurred for sharing or publication.
Lightweight design: Minimal resource requirements suitable for personal or small-scale use.
